content: So this is -- it really kind of breaks the mold of traditional BI and allows data to be combined with workflow, wrapped in an experience and put right in the hands, meaning right on the phone, on the tablet, the device of people making decisions which it breaks out a traditional BI because instead of low digit percent adoption of BI in an organization, you move to the whole company having an opportunity to use data to really drive their business and truly take action.
